thread.title: 'Embarrassing' Celebrity Big Brother star Chloe Ferry doesn't 'wear underwear or take baths'
thread.title_full: 'Embarrassing' Celebrity Big Brother star Chloe Ferry doesn't 'wear underwear or take baths'

author: Nicola Agius
title: 'Embarrassing' Celebrity Big Brother star Chloe Ferry doesn't 'wear underwear or take baths'
text:
'Embarrassing' Celebrity Big Brother star Chloe Ferry doesn't 'wear underwear or take baths' Viewers aren't too keen on the Geordie Shore star being in the house Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Chloe Ferry gets trashed by Kim Woodburn on CBB Share this video Get celebs   Could   
Chloe Ferry has disgusted Celebrity Big Brother fans. 
In scenes which were aired on Channel 5 tonight, Kim Woodburn and James Cosmo were seen talking about an earlier conversation they'd had with the Geordie Shore star. 
According to the pair, she had boasted that she never wears underwear and also doesn't take baths. 
"I don't dislike her but I just find her to be a vulgar, nasty little girl," Kim commented. Chloe Ferry has disgusted Celebrity Big Brother fans (Photo: Channel 5) 
James then added: "She's got a sad life ahead of her." 
Those tuning in at home appeared to agree with the pair's reaction. Read More 
Another then added: "Catching up on last night's #cbb This Chloe is absolutely disgusting! Not sure I want to watch this!! @bbuk." Read More 
Moments later, a different viewer commented: "I love Chloe in Geordie Shore. But I feel like her persona doesn't lend itself well to anything outside of that show. # CBB ." Apparently, Chloe doesn't wear underwear or take baths (Photo: Instagram @chloegshore1) 
Shortly afterwards, another wrote: "Chloe should have stuck to geordie shore, she's completely embarrassing herself #cbb." 
Yesterday, Chloe was blasted by CBB fans again when she stripped virtually naked on her very first night in the house. 
The gobby Geordie Shore star exposed her boobs and bum after getting drunk and her fellow housemates and stunned audiences were quick to comment. 
Does Chloe have a chance of winning this series? 
*Celebrity Big Brother returns to Channel 5 tomorrow at 9pm Like us on Facebook
